TABLE.NAME: block_ajax_marking
TABLE.COMMENT: stores user preferences (if any) on which assessments they would like hidden in the AJAX marking block.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: the userid of the person to whom this preference applies

FIELD.NAME: instanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: Matches the primary key of whatever table this setting refers to

FIELD.NAME: tablename
FIELD.COMMENT: What table contains the item we are making display settings for?

FIELD.NAME: display
FIELD.COMMENT: should this assessment be shown at all to this user? 0=no 1=yes default to yes

FIELD.NAME: groupsdisplay
FIELD.COMMENT: Should group nodes be shown for this item?

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: primary key of the table, please edit me

KEY.NAME: useridkey
KEY.COMMENT: links userid to the user table

TABLE.NAME: block_ajax_marking_groups
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds the show/hide status of the groups for each user's config choices. Display 1=show the group, display 0=hide it. A group id of 0 means what to do for students in no group.

FIELD.NAME: configid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the field in the config table

KEY.NAME: configid-id
KEY.COMMENT: Links this table with the config table

KEY.NAME: groupid-id
KEY.COMMENT: Links this table with the groups table
